span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用作方法（如）的返回类型 。 is used as the return type for methods such as . 它不用于应用程序定义的集合，您应使用更通用的类（如） 。It is not intended to be used for application-defined collections, for which you should use a more generic class such as .
